rdf:Description.dc:title: Mitigating condensation problems in rural northern housing 1991
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Lee, Tang G.
Alberta. Alberta Municipal Affairs.
Innovative Housing Grants Program (Alta.)
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Alberta Municipal Affairs, Innovative Housing Grants Program,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Report of a study to explore the issue of condensation in northern homes (northern rural Alberta, Gift Lake, Wabasca), and identify, test and evaluate mitigation strategies. The project team worked with staff of the Rural Home Assistance Program (RHAP) of Alberta Municipal Affairs.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Dampness in buildings.
Dwellings
